infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to capture photos for health documentation and insurance claims.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photos to upload health documentation and insurance claims.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app accesses your health data to provide personalized health insights and track your progress.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app updates your health data to keep track of your health metrics and goals.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This app uses Face ID to securely authenticate you.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses Bluetooth to connect with your health devices.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This app uses Bluetooth to connect with your health devices.

plugins.healthSharePermission: This app accesses your health data to provide personalized health insights and track your progress.
plugins.healthUpdatePermission: This app updates your health data to keep track of your health metrics and goals.

plugins.faceIDPermission: This app uses Face ID to securely authenticate you.
